Package io.github.ai4ci.abm

Interface Contact

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
@Immutable public interface Contact extends Serializable
A contact between two people. A contact is always associated with a PersonHistory which tells you when it happened. There are a lot of contacts recorded so this is optimised for small storage. and contains the bare minimum. Participants in the contact are resolved by id.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getParticipant

      default int getParticipant(int id)
      Get the other participant in a contact
      Parameters:
      id - the person id of one participant in the contact
      Returns:
      the person id of the other participant in the contact

    • getParticipant

      default PersonHistory getParticipant(PersonHistory one)
      Get the most recent history of the other participant in a contact
      Parameters:
      one - the history of one participant in the contact, used to resolve the other participant and the time of the contact
      Returns:
      the most recent history of the other participant in the contact, as of the time of the contact

    • getParticipant

      default PersonHistory getParticipant(PersonState one)
      Get the most recent history of the other participant in a contact
      Parameters:
      one - the state of one participant in the contact, used to resolve the other participant and the time of the contact
      Returns:
      the most recent history of the other participant in the contact, as of the time of the contact. Note that this is not necessarily the same as the current history of the other participant, since the contact may have occurred in the past. The current history is returned if the contact occurred at the current time step.

    • getParticipant1Id

      int getParticipant1Id()
      Get the unique identifier of the first participant in the contact.
      Returns:
      the person id of the first participant; corresponds to the id field of the source person record

    • getParticipant2Id

      int getParticipant2Id()
      Get the unique identifier of the second participant in the contact.
      Returns:
      the person id of the second participant; corresponds to the id field of the contacted person record

    • getParticipantState

      default PersonState getParticipantState(PersonTemporalState one)
      Get the current state of the other participant in a contact
      Parameters:
      one - the state of one participant in the contact, used to resolve the other participant and the time of the contact
      Returns:
      the current state of the other participant in the contact. Note that this is not necessarily the same as the state of the other participant at the time of the contact, since the contact may have occurred in the past. The state at the time of the contact is returned if the contact occurred at the current time step.

    • isDetected

      boolean isDetected()
      Whether the contact was detected by a smart agent. This is used to determine whether the contact should be included in contact tracing analyses and whether it should be included in contact network statistics. The contact may have been detected by a smart agent if either participant is a smart agent and the contact was detected by that agent. Note that a contact may be detected by one agent but not the other, so this is not necessarily symmetric.
      Returns:
      Was a contact detected by a smart agent
